result.html: An oireann an plean duitDoes the plan suit you?
result.ponchtml: An oireann an plean duitDoes the plan suit you?

result.eng: The plan could be finished in six years.
result.ga: D'fhéadfadh an beart a bheith críochnaithe faoi cheann sé bliana
result.orig: D'fhéadfadh an beart a bheith críochnaithe faoi cheann sé bliana
result.html: D'fhéadfadh an beart a bheith críochnaithe faoi cheann sé blianaThe plan could be finished in six years.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟéadfaḋ an beart a ḃeiṫ críoċnaiṫe faoi ċeann sé blianaThe plan could be finished in six years.

result.html: Má ritheann leis an phleanIf the plan succeeds.
result.ponchtml: Má riṫeann leis an ṗleanIf the plan succeeds.

result.eng: The plan is designed to promote cooperation between the member states.
result.ga: Tá an plean seo ceaptha chun comhar a chothú idir na ballstáit
result.orig: Tá an plean seo ceaptha chun comhar a chothú idir na ballstáit
result.html: Tá an plean seo ceaptha chun comhar a chothú idir na ballstáitThe plan is designed to promote cooperation between the member states.
result.ponchtml: Tá an plean seo ceapṫa ċun coṁar a ċoṫú idir na ballstáitThe plan is designed to promote cooperation between the member states.

result.eng: They have a plan to build a new train line.
result.ga: Tá plean acu líne traenach nua a thógáil
result.orig: Tá plean acu líne traenach nua a thógáil
result.html: Tá plean acu líne traenach nua a thógáilThey have a plan to build a new train line.
result.ponchtml: Tá plean acu líne traenaċ nua a ṫógáilThey have a plan to build a new train line.

result.eng: The Department of Education will prepare a development plan.
result.ga: Ullmhóidh an Roinn Oideachais plean forbartha
result.orig: Ullmhóidh an Roinn Oideachais plean forbartha
